reviews.review_text: I d like to give a huge thank you to Fraserview Hall for going above and beyond to host my Haldi and Reception events. Working with Fraserview was extremely easy and the staff prioritize their customers and truly want you to have the best experience. The hall itself is a stunning venue with chandeliers throughout the hall, a massive elevated dancefloor, modern carpeting, high quality speaker system and a gorgeous outdoor balcony that my guests enjoyed majority of their evening taking pictures outside on a sunny day. I can t thank the Manager Antony enough for his exceptional customer service. He is solely the reason why I booked both of my events at Fraserview Hall. I had other deposits at another competing hall but Antony ensured me that I was in good hands and now that my events are over I can 1000% say that Fraserview Hall exceeded my expectations. My family and friends are now booking Fraserview Hall for their events after attending mine. It was the most glamorous Haldi and Wedding Reception I ve ever experienced and booking Fraserview Hall was the best decision! The in house DJ was wonderful and played beautiful songs that my guests and myself could dance all night to. I highly recommend booking the in house DJ, they are very organized and prepare all your songs to make sure everything runs smoothly. The food was absolutely delicious, my guests had second helpings and several people told me their favourite items were the vegetable chow mein, fish pakora, chicken tikka, goat curry and bbq tandoori chicken. I also really enjoyed working with the Decor team. They truly worked their magic and made every detail look absolutely perfect. My Haldi night looked like a Bollywood movie set with all the beautiful bright colours, umbrella arch, glittery table runners, gold elephants and fancy decor pieces. They also created the most stunning set up for my Reception which included a hanging floral and crystal walkway, floating candles, chandeliers, white roses with an elegant backdrop for the stage. They upgraded and sourced gorgeous decor and took care of everything. I am grateful for the hard working staff, especially Harmeet and Shrungerri who executed my visions and made them better! My advice to anyone booking Fraserview Hall is to trust the staff, they know what they are doing and you will not be disappointed.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind review of Fraserview banquet hall. We are thrilled to hear that you had a satisfying experience during your recent visit. Our team takes pride in providing exceptional service and ensuring that our guests have a memorable time. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

reviews.review_text: The decor was so beautiful and the team was very accommodative and communicative! I am really happy doing my Maiyan and jago here especially for the nice decor services they offer with the package
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Gurinder, Thank you for taking time out to share your kind review. We appreciate your feedback and are glad that you had a good experience with our services. We look forward to hosting you again. Take care. Team Fraserview.

reviews.review_text: We attended a wedding reception at Fraserview banquet hall on Saturday, September 16, 2023. Overall, it was a great event, and the food was excellent. However, in particular, I would like to thank the gentleman standing outside the front door, who was responsible for security in the evening. We could not find parking so parked in the lot across the street and when he saw us approaching, he let us know that we should move our vehicle, as it would get towed.  During our conversation, we mentioned that we had a handicap parking decal, and he immediately offered us the parking spot that was reserved with pylons right next to the entrance of the hall. This is a level of courtesy that we usually do not see at these types of events. I appreciate Fraserview hiring staff members that care for their guests.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: It warms our hearts to read your glowing review! We strive to provide the best possible experience, and were ecstatic that we met your expectations.

reviews.review_text: Sunil  and his team are so responsive and are always available to answer any questions. Organizing my daughter party  with them has been a pleasure and I would highly recommend hosting an event here. The space is beautiful and the food is so good!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Niranjan, Thank you for your kind words and positive review of Fraserview Hall. We are delighted to hear that you had a fantastic experience with us. Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we are thrilled that we were able to meet your expectations. We appreciate your support and look forward to serving you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Beautiful brand new interior for celegrating any occasion. I was there yesterday, May 31st, 23. For a Mayian party. Food was very yummy,  we all enjoyed eating  all the snacks and went for seconds. Paneer pakoras were the best I had in town, crispy from outside and very soft from inside, taste amazing with perfectly made Ilaachi waali chai. All the other appetizers were made to its perfection,  I had chaat papdi twice. Dinner was served on time and again every thing was perfect,  I loved the saag paneer. DJ was awesome we had so much fun dancing.

reviews.review_text: From my first birthday to my twentieth, weddings, galas, and more, Fraserview Hall has been our go to. No where else can, on such a short notice, put together such huge scale events. Though the food isnt amazing for one with an Indian palate, anyone else will be going back to the buffet over and over again for the fresh cooked naan and butter chicken. If they have the outside tandoor set up, the spinach naan are heavenly.
Went for a mma event, place was bigger than expected, parking is limited on the property but there is decent parking in the area. Beware not to park near the Toyota dealership area.... They tow.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Denis
